title: Home Page Content Load and Display
description: Verify the Home Page loads correctly displaying featured projects, latest blog posts, team section, and Mailchimp newsletter subscription form.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home Page
Check that featured projects are displayed with proper titles and images
Verify latest blog posts are listed with correct titles and excerpts
Confirm team section is shown with member names and roles
Ensure newsletter subscription form is visible and accepts input

title: Newsletter Subscription Success Flow
description: Verify newsletter subscription through Mailchimp integration succeeds with valid email and displays confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to Home Page
Input a valid email address in the newsletter subscription form
Submit the subscription form
Validate that a success message or confirmation is displayed

title: Newsletter Subscription Failure Handling
description: Verify proper error message is shown when newsletter subscription fails due to invalid email or Mailchimp API error.

steps.description: Navigate to Home Page
Input an invalid email address or simulate Mailchimp API failure
Submit the subscription form
Ensure an appropriate error message is displayed to the user

title: About Page Content and Table of Contents Navigation
description: Verify About Page loads correctly with company introduction, work experience, education, technical skills sections and table of contents navigation works.

steps.description: Navigate to About Page
Check that company introduction, work experience, studies, and technical skills sections are displayed
Use the table of contents to navigate to each section
Confirm smooth scroll behavior brings the correct section into view

title: Blog Listing and Post Rendering
description: Verify the blog listing page displays all posts correctly and individual blog posts render MDX content including images, links, and embedded components accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to Blog listing page
Confirm all blog posts are listed with correct titles and excerpts
Click on a blog post to open the individual post page
Verify the MDX content is rendered properly including text, images, links, and custom components

title: Blog Post Social Sharing Functionality
description: Ensure social sharing buttons on blog posts function correctly, opening respective social media share dialogs with correct post link and title.

steps.description: Navigate to a blog post page
Click on each social media sharing button (e.g., Twitter, Facebook)
Verify social sharing dialog opens and contains correct post information in share content

title: RSS Feed Generation Verification
description: Verify that the RSS feed API endpoint returns a valid RSS feed containing the latest blog posts.

steps.description: Send a GET request to the RSS feed API endpoint
Validate the RSS XML content is well-formed and contains appropriate blog post entries

title: Work/Projects Listing and Detail View
description: Verify the Work/Projects section lists all projects and individual project detail pages display accurate information.

steps.description: Navigate to the Work/Projects listing page
Check that all projects are displayed with relevant summaries and images
Select a project to view its detailed page
Confirm detailed project information including descriptions and associated media is shown correctly

title: Gallery Photo Grid Display
description: Verify Gallery page loads with a responsive photo grid displaying images correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Gallery page
Confirm photo grid is displayed with loading of images visible
Verify images resize responsively on different screen sizes

title: Route Guard Password Protection Success
description: Verify that password protected routes prompt for authentication and allow access upon correct password entry.

steps.description: Navigate to a protected route URL
Confirm a password prompt or login form is displayed
Enter the correct password
Verify the protected content page loads successfully

title: Route Guard Password Protection Failure
description: Verify that access to protected routes is denied with invalid password and appropriate error is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to a protected route URL
Enter an incorrect password
Confirm access is denied and error notification is displayed

title: Theme Toggle and System Preference Detection
description: Verify that the theme toggle switches between light and dark modes correctly and initially detects system color preference.

steps.description: Load any page and observe the initial theme matches system preference
Toggle the theme switch to change the site theme
Confirm the theme changes visually between dark and light modes
Reload or revisit the site
Verify the last selected theme persists across page loads

title: OG Image Generation API Valid Response
description: Verify that the OG image generation API endpoint creates appropriate social media preview images and handles valid requests successfully.

steps.description: Send a valid POST or GET request to the OG image generation API with required parameters
Validate that the API returns a generated image URL or binary data successfully

title: OG Image Generation API Error Handling
description: Verify the OG image generation API returns appropriate error messages and handles invalid or malformed requests gracefully.

steps.description: Send an invalid or incomplete request to the OG image generation API
Confirm that a meaningful error response is returned

title: SEO Metadata Presence and Validity
description: Verify that each page generates correct automated SEO metadata including title, description, OG tags, schema markup, sitemap and robots.txt are present and valid.

steps.description: Inspect metadata in the HTML head section of Home, About, Blog and other pages
Check for presence and correctness of title, meta description, OG image, and schema markup
Fetch sitemap.xml and robots.txt files from the root path
Verify sitemap contains correct URLs and robots.txt exists with proper directives

title: Smooth Scroll to Hash Anchors
description: Verify smooth scrolling behavior when navigating to in-page hash anchors via table of contents or direct URL hash.

steps.description: Navigate within a page using links with hash anchors in URL (e.g., About page TOC or direct URL)
Confirm the page smoothly scrolls to the correct section with no jank or broken behavior

title: Header Component Navigation and Features
description: Verify the header component displays navigation menu, functional theme toggle, and location information correctly.

steps.description: Load a page and observe the header bar
Check that navigation menu links are present and clickable
Confirm the theme toggle is visible and operational
Validate that location (likely geographic or operational) display updates or shows correctly

title: Footer Component Content and Social Links
description: Verify footer displays social links and copyright information correctly.

steps.description: Scroll to the bottom of any page to view footer
Confirm social media icons/links are correct and clickable
Verify copyright text is present and accurate

title: API Authentication Success and Failure
description: Verify API routes for authentication check and password authentication return correct responses when provided with valid and invalid data.

steps.description: Send authentication request with valid credentials to authentication API
Assert the API returns success status and valid tokens or confirmation
Send authentication request with invalid credentials
Assert the API returns failure status and appropriate error message
